page.title: 11REDWAYS IN MILTON KEYNES
page.content: Redways are paths that are made of red tarmac. They run round Milton Keynes joining estates together. Redways are mainly made for cyclists,but pedestrians use them as well. I use redways alot, they are very handy to get to other places by bike or on foot.Redways go all round Milton Keynes- they take you to the countryside as well as the city centre. They are shown on the maps as red lines. Redways play a part in safety as well because they are away from the busy traffic and they are safe to use especially with small children. Milton Keynes is famous for its redways and parks; a lot of redways run through the parks. Redways are an asset to Milton Keynes and blend in well with the surroundings.
